section.title: Hear Your AI Shopping Assistant in Action
section.description: Listen to real conversations showcasing how our AI handles various e-commerce scenarios with natural, helpful communication.

voice_demos.title: Cart Recovery Call
voice_demos.description: AI proactively contacts customer who abandoned their cart

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Hello! This is Maya from TechMart UAE. I noticed you were looking at our wireless earbuds earlier but didn't complete your purchase. Is there anything I can help you with?

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: Hi! Yes, I was interested but wasn't sure about the battery life and compatibility with my iPhone.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Great questions! These earbuds have 8-hour battery life with the case providing 32 hours total. They're fully compatible with iPhone and include fast charging - 15 minutes gives you 3 hours of use. Plus, we have free shipping and 30-day returns.

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: That sounds perfect! Can you help me complete the order?

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Absolutely! I can complete your order right now. I also noticed you might like our phone case collection - I can add a 20% discount if you're interested. Your earbuds will arrive tomorrow with our express delivery.

voice_demos.title: Product Information Inquiry
voice_demos.description: Customer asking detailed questions about product specifications

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Dubai Fashion Online. I'm Layla, your shopping assistant. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: I'm looking for a formal dress for a wedding. I need size 12 and prefer navy or dark green.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Perfect! I have several beautiful options in size 12. Our navy blue silk dress with lace details is very popular - it's AED 450 and perfect for weddings. We also have a stunning emerald green chiffon dress for AED 380.

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: The navy one sounds nice. What's the return policy if it doesn't fit?

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Our return policy is very flexible - 30 days for exchanges or full refunds. We also offer free alterations at our Dubai Mall location if you need minor adjustments. Would you like me to reserve both sizes for you?

voice_demos.title: Order Status Check
voice_demos.description: Customer checking delivery status and requesting modifications

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Hello! This is Sawtic AI for Sports Zone Dubai. I can help you with your order status. May I have your order number?

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: Hi, my order number is SZ78945. I need to change the delivery address urgently.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: I found your order - running shoes and sports clothes for AED 680. Good news! Your order is still processing so I can update the delivery address. What's the new address?

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: Please change it to Dubai Marina, Building 5, Apartment 1204. Same contact number.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Perfect! I've updated your delivery address to Dubai Marina. Your order will arrive tomorrow between 10 AM and 2 PM. I'm sending you a confirmation SMS with the updated details now.

voice_demos.title: Multilingual Support
voice_demos.description: AI handling customer service in Arabic and English

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: أهلاً وسهلاً! مرحباً بكم في متجر الإمارات للإلكترونيات. كيف يمكنني مساعدتكم اليوم؟

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: السلام عليكم، أريد شراء لابتوب للطلاب، ما هي أفضل الخيارات المتاحة؟

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: وعليكم السلام! لدينا خيارات ممتازة للطلاب. أنصحكم بلابتوب HP بسعر 2,200 درهم أو Lenovo بسعر 1,800 درهم. كلاهما مناسب للدراسة ولديه ضمان سنتين.

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: Can you switch to English please? I'd like to know about the HP specifications.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Of course! The HP laptop has Intel i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD storage, and 15.6-inch display. Perfect for students with excellent battery life. Would you like me to reserve one for you?
